Top-3 Scripts:
ul_43013: title_num=2
  from_cell=1
# physical DVD
  to_cell="$(dvdxchap -t $title_num  /dev/dvd | sed -n 's/^CHAPTER\([0-9]\+\).*/\1/p' | sed -n '$p')"
# DVD .iso image  
  to_cell="$(dvdxchap -t $title_num "$dvd_iso"| sed -n 's/^CHAPTER\([0-9]\+\).*/\1/p' | sed -n '$p')"

ul_77834: ddrescue -n -b2048 /dev/cdrom cdimage mapfile
ddrescue -d -r1 -b2048 /dev/cdrom cdimage mapfile
